channel.title: Restricted mage
channel.description: how would i stop maging from working in a certain area of coords? because iwanna disable mage + range in my jad zone as people have some have found a bug and can attack jad without it hitting back :( please help me someone. much appreciated. :D

item.title: Restricted mage
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:2, topic:176222”]Well find the cases for the mage and range and add some like this:

if (absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >= 0000 && absY <= 0000) { return; } [/quote]

so like
if (absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >= 0000 && absY <= 0000)
{
return false;
}
else if (absX >= 9999 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 9999 && absY <= 9999)
{
return true;
}
then add spells here?

Read full topic
